mapper.update:
update data_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update data_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, read_count = #{readCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, download_count = #{downloadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, book_name = #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, periodical_time = #{periodicalTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, authors = #{authors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tags = #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(1) from data_info where 1=1 and book_name like CONCAT('%',#{book_name},'%') and name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') and type =#{type}
